replies.body: Dogs don't have black and white vision.

That kind of ruins the joke.....
But hell, I didn't know that
Well, its a rumor. Once was believed to possibly be true, never proven. I think they proved it wrong though.

Human eyes contain three 'cones' that can distinguish between red, blue, yellow and green light making it possible to see the full color spectrum. Dogs only have two cones, meaning they can't distinguish between red and green and see colors on a blue and yellow scale.

Color range:
http://i.dailymail.co.uk/i/pix/2013/07/23/article-2374872-1AF34123000005DC-790_296x205.jpg

 http://www.dailymail.co.uk/sciencetech/article-2374872/Dogs-CAN-colour-Scientists-dispel-myth-canines-black-white.html#ixzz46OA88UTX

I've seen this before, but it's still pretty funny.

anyway, I hate to do this, but I have a gamemode that needs people to know about it to work, so here is the post.
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/E6tTagL6-an-interesting-custom-game-concept-runebattle
The only person that sees this reply is the one who gets notified. In that case it would be me, and I've already read your thread.

it will also be seen by people that happen to look at comments, as well as the fact that you have some weight in the community, so if you play the mode and enjoy it, and by happenstance mention it in a post or reply, that will also probably boost numbers. I need as many people as possible to play this for it to work, you should know that by reading the post that it is community based, so I have had to stoop into doing this dishonorable thing for the sake of making it work at first, in hopes that it will eventually work.

This post is 2 days old and barely got any likes, I think it's the wrong place to get people to see it.

I won't play the mode because I can't play League. I spend more times making memes about the game than playing it XD
